description: Animal pet friends give us comfort and make us happy. We want to return the favor! Weighted blankets for dogs really work to help diminish anxiety. Super soft and the most comfortable. Let them snuggle down.
Yes of course! Our pet weighted blanket is filled with non-toxic and hypoallergenic pellets.
If your dog is a chewer, or tends to chew and destroy things, we do not recommend a weighted dog blanket to be used when unsupervised for the safety of your pet.
HOW CAN IT HELP MY PET?

Pets can benefit from some of the same therapies used on humans. Just as humans deal with issues like anxiety and post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD), dogs can also suffer from these issues and have a hard time coping with sensory experiences (e.g : fireworks, thunder, strong winds).Adding the weight allows the blanket to create deep touch pressure (DTP) therapy. The design of this dog blanket applies gentle and constant pressure to help calm anxiety, fear and overexcitement in dogs. The weight also helps promote relaxation and helps your dog or puppy regain his composure and calm.
HOW TO CHOOSE A WEIGHTED BLANKET FOR MY PET?
Our weighted dog blanket comes in many sizes, and it‚Äôs important to choose the right one to get the full effects. Please follow our recommendations on our size chart.
